entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is experiencing pain from his scar.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: A coach who is leading a team in practice. She insists that the practice was not a waste of time despite her lack of conviction.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is experiencing pain from his bandaged legs.

entities.name: george
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, who is also experiencing pain from his bandaged legs.

relationships.description: Harry can hear Fred complaining in low voices as he toweled his hair dry.
Harry can also hear George complaining in low voices as he toweled his hair dry.
Fred says that a few of Harry's team members have ruptured, implying that their pain is comparable to his own.
George also says that his pain is similar to Harry's, as his legs are throbbing and feeling bigger than usual.
Angelina insists that the practice was not a waste of time, despite Harry's pain and discomfort.
